data.eml:eml: Revision of the Oriental genus Horniella Raffray (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Pselaphinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yin, Zi-Wei, Li, Li-Zhen (2014): Revision of the Oriental genus Horniella Raffray (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Pselaphinae). Zootaxa 3850 (1): 1-83, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3850.1.1
